# level(of:)

**Instance Method**

Finds the hierarchical level of the specified item in the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func level(of item: ItemIdentifierType) -> Int
```

## Discussion

A level of `0` means the item is at the root level of the section snapshot.

## Getting item metrics

- **index(of:)**: Finds the index of the specified item in the section snapshot.
- **parent(of:)**: Finds the parent item of the specified item in the section snapshot.
- **contains(_:)**: Indicates whether the section snapshot contains the specified item.
- **isVisible(_:)**: Indicates whether the specified item is currently visible onscreen.
